channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Push Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Push Service

item.title: CVE-2023-42541|2023-11-07T07:49:39.483Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20push%20service
item.description: Improper authorization in PushClientProvider of Samsung Push Service prior to version 3.4.10 allows attacker to access unique id.

item.title: CVE-2023-42542|2023-11-07T07:49:40.453Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20push%20service
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Push Service prior to 3.4.10 allows local attackers to get register ID to identify the device.
